docs.snippet: German prosecutors have decided that nobody other than pilot Andreas Lubitz could be held accountable for the crash of a Germanwings plane in March 2015, a spokesman for the public prosecutor's office said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: German prosecutors have decided that nobody other than pilot Andreas Lubitz could be held accountable for the crash of a Germanwings plane in March 2015, a spokesman for the public prosecutor's office said on Monday.

headline.main: German Investigators Find Only Pilot Lubitz at Fault in Germanwings Crash
headline.print_headline: German Investigators Find Only Pilot Lubitz at Fault in Germanwings Crash

docs.snippet: Five suicide bombers trying to infiltrate Nigeria's northeastern city of Maiduguri have died in explosions that killed at least three civilians, police said Monday, blaming Boko Haram Islamic extremists....
docs.lead_paragraph: Five suicide bombers trying to infiltrate Nigeria's northeastern city of Maiduguri have died in explosions that killed at least three civilians, police said Monday, blaming Boko Haram Islamic extremists.

headline.main: 5 Suicide Bombers Die, Kill 3 Near Nigeria's Maiduguri City

docs.snippet: Macedonian President Gjorge Ivanov said on Monday he would ask Nikola Gruevski, the veteran leader of the conservative VMRO-DPMNE party, to form a new government following a parliamentary election last month....
docs.lead_paragraph: Macedonian President Gjorge Ivanov said on Monday he would ask Nikola Gruevski, the veteran leader of the conservative VMRO-DPMNE party, to form a new government following a parliamentary election last month.

headline.main: Veteran Macedonian Leader Gruevski to Receive Mandate to Form Next Government
